Question: Do you like to arrange items in rows or patterns?
Options: One or more times daily (mild or occasional)

Question: Do you repetitively fiddle with items? (e.g. spin, twiddle, bang, tap, twist, or flick anything repeatedly?)
Options: One or more times daily (mild or occasional)

Question: Do you like to spin yourself around and around?
Options: One or more times daily (mild or occasional)

Question: Do you like to rock back and forth or side to side either when sitting or standing?
Options: One or more times daily (mild or occasional)

Question: Do you pace or move around repetitively (e.g. walk to and fro across a room, or around the same path in the garden?)
Options: One or more times daily (mild or occasional)

Question: Do you make repetitive hand and/or finger movements? (e.g. flap, wave, or flick your hands or fingers repetitively?)
Options: One or more times daily (mild or occasional)

Question: Do you have a fascination with specific objects (e.g. trains, road signs, or other things?)
Do you like to look at objects from particular or unusual angles?
Do you have a special interest in the smell of people or objects?
Do you have a special interest in the feel of different surfaces?
Do you have any special objects you like to carry around?
Do you collect or hoard items of any sort?
Do you insist on things at home remaining the same? (e.g. furniture staying in the same place, things being kept in certain places, or arranged in certain ways?)
Options: Mild or occasional(does not affect others)
Serious or severe(affects others on a regular basis)

Question: Do you get upset about minor changes to objects (e.g. flecks of dirt on your clothes, minor scratches on objects?)
Options: Mild or occasional(does not affect others)
Serious or severe(affects others on a regular basis)

Question: Do you insist that aspects of daily routine must remain the same?
Options: Mild or occasional(does not affect others)
Serious or severe(affects others on a regular basis)

Question: Do you insist on doing things in a certain way or re-doing things until they are 'just right'?
Options: Mild or occasional(does not affect others)
Serious or severe(affects others on a regular basis)

Question: Do you play the same music, game or video, or read the same book repeatedly?
Options: Mild or occasional(does not affect others)
Serious or severe(affects others on a regular basis)

Question: Do you insist on wearing the same clothes or refuse to wear new clothes?
Options: Mild or occasional(does not affect others)
Serious or severe(affects others on a regular basis)

Question: Do you insist on eating the same foods, or a very small range of foods, at every meal?
Options: Mild or occasional(does not affect others)
Serious or severe(affects others on a regular basis)

Question: If you are left to occupy yourself, will you choose from a restricted range of repetitive activities?
Options: A range of different and flexible self - chosen activities
Some varied and flexible interests but commonly choose the same activities
Almost always choose from a restricted range of repetitive activities
